Elsie Garrett Rice (ụbọchị irí abụọ na isé n'ọnwa Nọvemba 1869 Elton, Derbyshire rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Eprel 1959 Cape Town bụ ónyé na-ese ihe ọkụkụ nà South Africa.
Nné na nnà Elsie Garret Rice bụ Mary Gray na Reverend John Feydell Garrett. E mèrè Elsie na ejima ya John Herbert Garrett baptizim na Elton n'ubochí irí na isii n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1870
Ya na ụmụnne ya atọ, John, Edmund na Amy, bụ ụmụ mgbei mgbè ha dị obere ma ụmụ nwanne nne ha abụọ, Millicent Fawcett na Agnes Garrett zụlitere ha
Millicent na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Suffragist Movement ma lụọ Sir Henry Fawcett, Ónyé Postmaster-General, onye kpuru ìsì n'ihe mberede ịchụ nta.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Slade School of Art na Florence.
Rice kụziri na Bedales School, nke nwanne di ya bụ John Badley (1865-1967) guzobere
Na Bedales ọ zutere di ya n'ọdịnihu, Charles Emmanuel Rice (1865-1949), onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ King Alfred School, Hampstead
N'afọ 1901, ya na di ya na otu nwa nwoke na otu nwa nwanyị bi na Hampstead

Ka ọ na-erule 1911, Elsie, bụ onye nkuzi nka dị afọ iri anọ na otu ma biri na Steep, Hampshire na di ya dị afọ iri ise na ise na ụmụ abụọ, Gabriel Edmund irí ná otu nà Agnes Rosemary irí , amụrụ ha abụọ na Hampstead
Charles Rice ruru eru dị ka dọkịta na 1918.

Elsie kewapụrụ onwé ya n'ebe di ya nọ wee kwaga South Africa na 1933, na mbụ biri na Rondebosch ma mesịa kwaga Camps Bay ya na nwa ya nwanyị Rosemary Agnes Hawthorne na ọgọ ya nwoke Dr Charles Barnard Hawthornes, Ónyé lụrụ na Coventry na 1923, wee soro Elsie gaa Cape na 1934.  Nwa nwa Elsie bụ Nigel Hawthorne.

Ọ malitere ise okooko osisi ọhịa ma mesịa see ihe osise nke Robert Harold Compton 'Wild Flowers of The Cape of Good Hope' nke e bipụtara na 1951. O gosikwara akwụkwọ Harry Hall 'Common Succulents' (Longmans, London, 1955)
